fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.continuous.discontinuities

Interface DistanceFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrechetDistanceFunction, HausdorffDistanceFunction, MeanLineDistanceFunction

    public interface DistanceFunction
    In order to identify discontinuities in continuous generalization, i.e. scales to avoid that create piecewise continuity rather than strict continuity, distance functions compute a similarity distance with a previous scale (scale is discretized).
    Author:
    gtouya

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDistance(IGeometry previous, IGeometry current)
      Get the distance value between a current geometry and the geometry at the previous scale.
      String getName()
      Gives the function name
